gen:link.msg:message: v6565_a: [Approach for the calculation of own funds requirements] facts must (if reported) be one of the items [1250% for positions not subject to any method], [Internal Assessment Approach (IAA)], [Internal ratings-based approach for securitisation positions (SEC-IRBA)], [Standardised approach for securitisations (SEC-SA)], [External ratings-based approach for securitisation positions (SEC-ERBA)], [Other (original securitisation framework)], [Multiple approaches] --> [C 14.00] [ei595] ∈ {{[eba_AP:x1], [eba_AP:x25], [eba_AP:x118], [eba_AP:x122], [eba_AP:x125], [eba_AP:x133], [eba_AP:x134]}} FAILS because {eba_fmt:interval($a)} = (xs:QName('eba_AP:x1'), xs:QName('eba_AP:x25'), xs:QName('eba_AP:x118'), xs:QName('eba_AP:x122'), xs:QName('eba_AP:x125'), xs:QName('eba_AP:x133'), xs:QName('eba_AP:x134')) is not true
